summary: The Airflow plugin package translates Metaflow flow definitions into executable Apache Airflow DAGs, providing CLI tools, decorators, and utility classes to generate DAG files, manage task inputs, retries, scheduling, token handling, and integration with Kubernetes, secret backends, and various storage options. It also defines a custom exception for Airflowâ€‘related failures.
business_intent: Allow Metaflow users to deploy and run their data science workflows on Airflow clusters with minimal manual configuration, supporting automated DAG creation, secure authentication, and compatibility with Kubernetes and cloud services.
